Articles.Content:
M3X update  v1.5 for KSP ~~1.9.1~~ 1.10 is now up. I apologize for the wait.  

Grab it from [SpaceDock](https://spacedock.info/mod/663/Mk3%20Stockalike%20Expansion) | [GitHub](https://github.com/SuicidalInsanity/Mk3Expansion/releases/download/1.5/Mk3Expansion-1.5.zip)  

Changelog:

Spoiler

-New Part: Mk3 Heavy <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">VTOL</abbr> engine  

-New Part: Mk3 Ram Intake  

-Model Rework: Mk3 cockpit  

-Model Rework: Mk3 Turbofan  

-Fixes Hurricane prop attach node size  

-Fixes Taurus/Minotaur/Atlas texture  

-Fixes short Mk3-S2 adapter fuel qty.  

-Fixes decoupler crossfeed issue  

-Kerbals no longer hidden behind consoles in Mk3 Inline Cockpit IVA portrait cams  

-Fixes Firestorm drag cube  

-Mk3 Intake prices/masses/intake volumes brought inline with stock  

-All Mk3 parts now have correct breakingForce & breakingTorque values  

-Rework of variant part names and descriptions.  

-Fixes ShovelCockpit naming

Whay apologize for the wait you do this in your spare time but I am glad for the update though. Really life comes first the game comes second.

Can not wait to try it when I get off work![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif ":rolleyes:")

Rather unfortunately it seems that I cannot get the lovely new Elephant <abbr title="Vertical Take-Off and Landing">vtol</abbr> engines enough intake air no matter how hard I try given they want 255/s. Also worth noting is that in stack mount configuration their own intakes are counted as occluded and cannot contribute to the massive demand these engines have for air.
Anyone have screenshots of the model reworks in last patch?

Elephant has been tweaked, should be more usable now. Also update to KSP 1.10.1 I guess.  

Grab from the [Usual](https://spacedock.info/mod/663/Mk3%20Stockalike%20Expansion) [Places](https://github.com/SuicidalInsanity/Mk3Expansion/releases/tag/1.5.1).  

Changelog:  

-Elephant Intake no longer occluded in stack mode  

-Elephant now permits radial attachment of parts to it when fairingless

[@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/) Hi, I've found something unusual with MK3 inline docking port drag parameters.

While the docking port closed adjacent parts create a lot of drag, workaround of this issue is fly while docking port opened.

This time I tried fresh ksp install with only this mod but no luck.

[https://imgur.com/a/wu2CQLZ](https://imgur.com/a/wu2CQLZ)

![Nnqny6w.png](https://i.imgur.com/Nnqny6w.png)![CBfzVHE.png](https://i.imgur.com/CBfzVHE.png)

Hi, [@SuicidalInsanity](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/143878-suicidalinsanity/)!

I found something odd. I just installed Mk3 Expansion via <abbr title="Comprehensive Kerbal Archive Network (a KSP mod manager)">CKAN</abbr> to diagnose something completely unrelated (but since the user had this installed, so I had to have too), and found this problem on the localization file:

        #LOC_M3X_CSaddleTank_Name = Mk3 Short Trucated Saddletank   #LOC_M3X_CSaddleTank_desc = A short fuselage extension saddletank designed to fit on the side of a Mk3 fuselage. This one is truncated to fit around an open mk3 cargo bay. ="green">Has three variants.
        #LOC_M3X_CSaddleTank_tags = mk3 m3x aircraft airplane fueltank jet ?lf only plane propellant tank extension

There's a missing EoL between \_Name and \_desc .

However, I just checked on [GitHub](https://github.com/SuicidalInsanity/Mk3Expansion/blame/master/Mk3Expansion/GameData/Mk3Expansion/Localization/en-us.cfg) and everything is perfectly fine there.

Some distribution file is messed up somehow!

Cheers!

Apologies for the wait, M3X 1.6 is now up and available from the usual  locations: [SpaceDock](https://spacedock.info/mod/663/Mk3%20Stockalike%20Expansion?ga=%3CGame+3102+%27Kerbal+Space+Program%27%3E) | [GitHub](https://github.com/SuicidalInsanity/Mk3Expansion/releases/tag/1.6)   

Changelog:  

- KSP 1.11.x update  

- New Part: Mk3 Cargo Container  

- Adds Cargo/Inventory part functionality  

- Fixes Mk3 Inline Docking Port dragcube  

- Adds optional <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)"><abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr></abbr> patch to add stock heat/reactor decay mechanics to Sievert NTJ  

- Adds optional <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)"><abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr></abbr> patch to add dual-cycle capability to Sievert NTJ  

- Adds System Heat compatibility <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)"><abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr></abbr> patch  

- Localization fix for Short Truncated Saddletank  

The new optional patches can be found in M3X-1.6/Extras/Mk3Expansion/patches

**Edited <time datetime="2021-05-23T02:08:12Z" title="05/23/2021 02:08  AM" data-short="3 yr">May 23, 2021</time> by SuicidalInsanity**

Eyyy he's alive! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D") Thanks for the update, been wanting SH compatability for a while now, was even planning on throwing something together myself.

Hi, I tried installing this, and the game gets jammed the moment it tries loading the subsonic intake. I tried to open the model file for that part, but I can't. My computer says it is unreadable. This may apply to all the parts. Does anyone have any idea what's going on?
Did you install CommunityResourcePack? It's bundled with M3X and is a dependency.

Oh. I didn't know I was supposed to. It works now!

**Edited <time datetime="2021-05-23T18:08:05Z" title="05/23/2021 06:08  PM" data-short="3 yr">May 23, 2021</time> by Orion Aerospace7**
  
Installation sucessful.

Any chance for waterfall configs in the future? It's becoming a very popular visual mod nowdays, would be nice.

Thanks.

The "Mk3 to Mk1 Adapter" is missing texture!

Thanks

The part 'M3X\_StructuralTube' throw this message every time I select it or load a ship that uses it!

    [ModuleCargoBay]: Module ModuleCargoBay is not an IScalarModule

Thanks.
with the new texture changes the mk3 docking ports are now plain white and the mapping for the textures has also changed, I hope there will be a fix in the next version

I am vaguely under the impression that some of the shoulder/chine segments are slightly model and/or texture mismatched. 2 long Mk3 chine segments, placed end to end will not align, but if one of them is flipped, it will match up. Likewise, the long chine segments will rare line up properly with chine caps or chine <abbr title="Reaction Control System">RCS</abbr> blocks.

I don't know enough about 3D modeling to troubleshoot this issue. What can I do to help?
Any word on 1.12.2?

> 
> 
> On 8/5/2021 at 4:33 AM, Tommy0604 said:
> 
> 
> with the new texture changes the mk3 docking ports are now plain white and the mapping for the textures has also changed, I hope there will be a fix in the next version
> 

same with mk2 expansion and some engines

Hi! I love your work, especially the cargo nose! If you find some spare time I'd like to request a hollow cargo version of the *Mk3 T-Hub*, *Mk3 X-Hu*b and *Mk3 L-Hub.* So we can drive around inside wiggly cargo bays.

**BAD NEWS!**

Even if my <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr> patch, to change the model textures, are pointing to the right ones, somehow KSP is not really react to the part in "zDeprecated" folder. Dunno if its ReStock acting weird on my install, some typos made by me or the base game behaviour that avoid to load textures in those folder.

As VERY ROUGH workaround, for myself, I simply took the needed textures, copied out of Squad folder in one of my own creation, and adjusted my above patches accordingly (with the new custom folder address, rather than the "Squad/zDeprecated/..." one). Obviously, that way, no need for any restockwhitelist.

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Araym said:
> 
> 
> **BAD NEWS!**
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Even if my <abbr title="Module Manager (mod)"><abbr title="Module Manager (mod)">MM</abbr></abbr> patch, to change the model textures, are pointing to the right ones, somehow KSP is not really react to the part in "zDeprecated" folder. Dunno if its ReStock acting weird on my install, some typos made by me or the base game behaviour that avoid to load textures in those folder.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> As VERY ROUGH workaround, for myself, I simply took the needed textures, copied out of Squad folder in one of my own creation, and adjusted my above patches accordingly (with the new custom folder address, rather than the "Squad/zDeprecated/..." one). Obviously, that way, no need for any restockwhitelist.
> 

The game doesn't load folders called 'zDeprecated'

> 
> 
> 1 hour ago, OrdinaryKerman said:
> 
> 
> The game doesn't load folders called 'zDeprecated'
> 

I guessed it...

... the only alternative is manual move the needed files outside (I did it) or make a little script that, automatically, move the needed files (something alike was done for STX, that has a small bak file that fishes for the zDeprecated textures).

Still alive here. Sorry about the delay, and many thanks to Araym for providing support while I was absent. Update 1.6.1 is now up at [SpaceDock](https://spacedock.info/mod/663/Mk3%20Stockalike%20Expansion?ga=%3CGame+3102+%27Kerbal+Space+Program%27%3E) and [GitHub](https://github.com/SuicidalInsanity/Mk3Expansion/releases/tag/1.6.1), which fixes/reworks parts with missing textures, as well as some new stuff.  

Changelog:  

-KSP 1.12.x update  

-Part Rework: CLEAVER  

-New Part: Structural X fuselage  

-New Part: Structural T Fuselage  

-New part: Structural L Fuselage  

-Fixes missing texture on Cyclone Engine  

-Fixes missing texture on Hurricane Engine  

-Fixes missing texture on Service Bay  

-Fixes missing texture on Minotaur SRBs  

-Fixes missing Testure on Atlas <abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster"><abbr title="Solid fuel Rocket Booster">SRB</abbr></abbr>  

-Fixes missing texture on Linear Aerospike  

-Fixes missing texture on Service bay  

-Model Rework: Aligned Docking Port  

-Model Rework: Inline Docking Port  

-Model Rework: Stack Docking Port
